key_validation_account_not_found: L'account specificato non è stato trovato.
key_validation_invalid_key: La chiave privata inserita non può essere risolta in una chiave pubblica. Si prega di assicurarsi che sia stata inserita correttamente.
key_validation_no_permission: La chiave privata specificata non dispone dell'autorizzazione per eseguire azioni per l'account specificato
wallet_account_lookup_modal_accounts_fou: Account trovati con la chiave corrispondente ...
Nessun account trovato con questa chiave
wallet_account_lookup_modal_description: Inserisci la tua chiave pubblica (inizia con RSN ...) per cercare gli account ad essa associati.
wallet_account_lookup_modal_key_invalid: La chiave inserita non è una chiave pubblica RSN valida.
wallet_account_lookup_modal_title: Cerca account con la  Public Key
wallet_account_lookup_modal_trigger: Cerchi il nome del tuo account?
wallet_account_request_backup_instructio: This process will prompt you to save your newly created public and Bank Account's Private Keys to an encrypted wallet file on your local computer using a password. The password will be required when using importing the backup and cannot the keys cannot be recovered without it.
wallet_account_request_backup_subheader: Encrypt and save your Bank Account's Private Keys
wallet_account_request_code_subheader: The following string of characters is an Bank Account Request Code (BARC). This string contains the requested username and public keys (not private). This string can be loaded into the bank account of an existing account holder or service, to allow the creation of your account.
wallet_account_request_step_generate_des: Pick a name and generate bank account  keys.
wallet_account_request_step_request_desc: Send the request code to a friend.
wallet_account_request_subheader: Know someone who is willing to create an account for you? Go through the following process to securely generate the keys for a new bank account. At the end of the process a request code will be given to you, which an existing account holder can use to create your new bank account.
wallet_mode_explain_cold: this bank account is running as a 'Cold' wallet, meaning it should be run offline and is unable to Broadcast Bank Transactions. Broadasting must be done via a RoboBanker.
wallet_mode_explain_hot: this bank account is running as a 'Hot' wallet, meaning it can create, sign, and Broadcast Bank Transactions without the assistance of any other wallet.
wallet_mode_explain_undefined: this bank account is from a legacy version and it's type is unknown. This should not cause any problems, and once you swap to another wallet and back, it should upgrade properly.
wallet_mode_explain_watch: this bank account is running as a 'Watch' wallet, meaning it will not store Bank Account's Private Keys and cannot sign transactions. Signing must be done via a BankVault.
wallet_panel_form_create_wallet_body: Per utilizzare avote per votare, inserisci il nome dell'account e la  Bank Account's Private Key.
wallet_panel_form_encrypt_wallet: Salva / cripta il portafoglio locale con password?
wallet_panel_form_not_saved: La Bank Account's Private Key non verrà salvata all'interno dell'applicazione - dovrà essere reinserita ogni volta che si apre l'applicazione.
wallet_panel_form_will_save: Il nome dell'account e laBank Account's Private Key saranno crittografati e salvati nell'applicazione. La password sarà richiesta per sbloccare la chiave per l'utilizzo.
wallet_panel_locked_subheader: Per attuare queste azioni il portafoglio deve essere sbloccato.
wallet_panel_password_confirm_descriptio: Reinserisci la password per il portafoglio locale per procedere.
wallet_panel_waiting_instructions: The application will monitor for the creation of this new bank account. Once the new bank account has been created, the application will prompt you to enter your backup password once more, and then establish a local HotBank.
wallet_panel_waiting_subheader: This bank account has not yet been created.
wallet_panel_wallet_unlock_modal_descrip: Inserisci la password per sbloccare il portafoglio locale.
wallet_status_add_custom_token_action_su: To manage Custom Private Currencys in this bank account, click on the Tools section, and look under the 'Airdrops / Custom Private Currencys' section.
wallet_status_add_custom_token_subheader: The token balances of this bank account for all tracked contracts ('arisen.token' only by default).
